[[File:WindBurial.PNG|thumb|right|280px]]
A '''wind burial''' was a common type of burial used by the [[Tuigan]].

The bodies of commoners were placed on simple wooden frames. Offerings were placed around the body, and it was left exposed to the elements until the remains and structure crumbled into dust.
